title: View Award Entry Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user want to view a player's awards
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to Major Contracts and clicks on it from the left nav
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the 'Award Entry Utility'

title: Verify 'Year' dropdown contains entry for each year of players record (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in Award Entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'Year' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the dropdown will display an entry for each year from the current year to the first year of record (1991)

title: Verify 'League' dropdown (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'league' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the 'league' dropdown contains AL, NL and a blank tab

title: Verify 'Award' dropdown (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'award' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN all awards are listed alphabetically

title: Select "Most AS Votes- Overall" Award (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'Most AS Votes- Overall'
custom_expected: THEN 'league' dropdown is set to blank and disabled

title: Select "World Series MVP" Award (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'World Series MVP' under the award dropdown
custom_expected: THEN 'league' dropdown is left blank and disabled

title: Verify 'Position' dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to award entry utility
AND Selected an AWARD that is position based i.e Silver Slugger, Gold Glove
custom_steps: WHEN the position dropdown is clicked
custom_expected: THEN positions are displayed in dropdown list

title: Select an award and verify Position
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN an award is selected from the drop down that corresponds with a position
custom_expected: THEN system will enable position drop down in table

title: Select an award that does NOT have a Position
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN user enters an award that does not have a position
custom_expected: THEN Position dropdown is not displayed.

title: As a BOC admin I want to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_preconds: GIVEN "MJC Award Bonus Batch" is a batch option under the "Major Contracts" section on the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "MJC Award Bonus Batch"
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the batch in the batch screen 
AND the batch parameters should display per the batch requirements
AND a "Run" button should be available
AND clicking "Run" should run the batch according to the selected parameters
AND when the batch is run system should: 
    - Get Contracts with Award Bonus Terms, Salary Escalators and Conditional Options that are currently in an Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year status that contain a contract with an Award Bonus or criteria that is not yet marked official
    - Iterate over contacts containing awards
    - Process Award 
    - Check for bonus terms and place finished values
    - Update salaries/earned amounts as necessary
    - Calculate Vesting Options
    - Calculate LRD Present Values
    - Calculate Earn Assignment Bonuses
    - Calculate Bonus Maximums
    - Calculate LRD Salary
    - Calculate Total Guaranteed 
    - Set offered and earned bonus amounts
    - Save contract
AND results should only include players who had a contract updated by the batch and should display in the "Batch Results" widget
AND available columns should be Player ID, Player's Name, Org, Club, and Roster Status
AND batch run information should display in the batch history widget.

title: As a BOC admin I want to running the MJ Award Bonus Batch to generate notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the batch in Update Mode
custom_expected:
THEN a notification should be generated for any clause that is updated
AND if an award bonus is marked earned, Notification #1 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with
AND if a salary escalator with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #3 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with 
AND if an Option with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #6 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with

title: View Awards in a player's history
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Player History of a Pro Player
custom_steps: WHEN the Player has received an award
custom_expected:
THEN the award will appear in the player history 
AND "Considered For" appears followed by "
AND League Award Name - Position: POS Votes: # Place: #*" as an entry in the Player History for any player that was listed in the Award Entry Utility. (EX: Considered for AL All Star Election Award - Position: DH Votes: 1 Place: 1)
AND Ideally if there is no league associated w/ the award it would just not show AL or NL - though ebis1 says "Null" so that's OK if that's easiest.  AND Date is the date the award entry was saved. 
AND Code is Award
AND This entry is not a hyperlink and is all black.

title: BOC user can enter info for All Star starting Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to enter info for the all star starting pitcher
AND has loaded the award entry utility page in 'edit' mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a 'year' and a 'league' and the 'all star starting pitcher' award
AND selects an 'org' and 'player'
AND clicks 'save'
custom_expected: THEN page should reload in view mode with saved data

title: System can calculate a player's place using votes/points entered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants the system to calculate a player's placement in an award category
AND the user is in 'edit' mode in the award entry utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects an award with placements (i.e. all star selection)
AND gives numerical values to the 'votes/points' dropdown
AND assigns players to those values
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the system will place the player's in order of their votes/points
AND all data entered is saved

title: BOC Rules check no errors
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is editing the award entry utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks save
AND there are no errors
custom_expected:
THEN data is saved and a blue notification displays.
AND page reloads to view mode.

title: BOC Rules check errors
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing the award entry utility
AND there are required fields left blank
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN an error message appears with the fields that require action
AND the fields with errors are outlined in red

title: BOC cancel changes made
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user clicks edit on the Award entry utility 
AND has made some changes
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Cancel'
custom_expected:
THEN message appears
IF user selects 'yes' utility reloads in view mode with no changes are saved
IF user selects 'no' message closes and user returns to utility in edit mode showing their previous changes made

title: Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN only certain user's can view/edit the award entry utility
AND these are the user's who can edit: LRD Admin
AND these are the user's who can view: BOC Basic and LRD Admin
AND no other users can view/edit unless given permission
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logs in to an account with permissions to view/edit
OR a user logs in to an account with view permissions
OR a user logs in with no permissions
custom_expected:
THEN the award entry utility should only be editable to the proper users
AND the award entry utility should only be viewable to the proper users
AND the award entry utility should not viewable anywhere in the system to users with no permissions

title: Add New Year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants a new year to be added to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN a new year starts
custom_expected:
THEN a new year is added to the award entry utility
AND it can be selected
AND awards can be added to that year

title: BOC receives error if all required fields are not filled in
custom_preconds:
Given the BOC user has navigated to the Award Entry Utility 
AND is added a player to the award
custom_steps:
WHEN the user leaves one of the required fields blank 
AND clicks SAVE
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive and error message that required fields need to be filled in

title: BOC receives error if formatting of fields is incorrect
custom_preconds:
Given the BOC user has navigated to the Award Entry Utility 
AND has added a player to the award
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a non-numerical value in the "Votes/Points" field
AND clicks SAVE
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive and error message stating "You have entered an invalid value in the Votes/Points field. Please enter a whole number."

title: Award Entry permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The Award Entry screen should have its own view and edit permissions. 
* By default the View permissions are given to the BOC MJC Read Only account, and the Edit permissions are given to the BOC MJC Admin account. Club users will not have any access to this screen. 
* Users without either the view or edit permission should not see the tab at all.

title: Award Entry Permissions -BOC Read
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a an MJC BOC Read only account
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate to Award Entry
custom_expected: THEN they will only be able to view the Award Entry Utility and NOT make any updates

title: Award Entry Permissions -BOC EDIT
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a an MJC BOC Edit account
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate to Award Entry
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to view the Award Entry Utility and make any updates

title: Award Entry Permissions- Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a Club account
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate to Major Contract dashboard
custom_expected: THEN they will not be able to see the Award Entry tab
